content: double_crochet into next st double_crochet into next st fptc round same st double_crochet into next st fptc round next st double_crochet into next st fptc round same st double_crochet into next st * repeat from * to * twice repeat a 3rd time missing off final double_crochet slip_stitch into top of turning chain of previous row 48 st round 5 chain 3 * double_crochet into next st fptc round next st 2 double_crochet into next st fptc round next st double_crochet into next 2 sts fptc round next st 2 double_crochet into next fptc round next 2 double_crochet into next fptc round next st double_crochet into next st * repeat from * to * twice repeat a 3rd time missing off final double_crochet slip_stitch into top of turning chain of previous row 60 st all remaining row expect the final row are the same and follow the pattern 2 double_crochet 1 fptc double_crochet into the dcs and fptc round the fptcs round 6-15 chain 3 double_crochet into next st fptc round next * double_crochet into next 2 sts fptc round next * repeat from * to * to end sl into top of turning chain of previous row 60 st final row ch3 double_crochet into each st round fasten_off yarn 60 st rrriiibbbbbbeeeddd hhhaaattt special stitches fptc and fptc for lefties 1 working into a 3 yarn over and row of double draw loop back crochet yarn over under post 2 insert hook 4 yarn over and behind the post of draw through 2 the next double_crochet from left loops on hook yarn to right over and raw through remaining 2 loops on hook as you would a normal double_crochet both the fpdc and fptc stitches are formed in the same way to complete a fptc yarn over twice in step 1 and to complete yarn over and draw through 2 loops on hook an extra time
